Company Name: DINESHCHANDRA R AGRAWAL INFRACON PVT LTD
Company Group: DINESHCHANDRA R AGRAWAL INFRACON PVT LTD
Detailed Description: Won a ₹792 crore civil contract for the construction of 5 underground metro stations of Corridor 3 of Chennai Metro Rail Project Phase 2 in a joint venture with Soma Construction.

Contract/Favour/Project: Bhopal & Indore Metro Head Hardened Rail
Detailed Description: November 19 2022 Original Post: Jindal Steel & Power Ltd. (JSPL) in late October emerged as the lowest bidder to supply 18m long head hardened rails for Indore Metro and Bhopal Metro’s Phase 1 projects.

NCC Limited was awarded a contract for the construction of the Patna Metro Phase 1 project’s 6.107 km Malahi Pakri – New ISBT section of the 14.05 km Line-2. The contract, valued at Rs. 552.93 crore, includes the construction of elevated viaducts, five elevated stations, and related infrastructure.
The Nagarjuna Construction Company won a bid to build Namma Metro’s Airport Line in September 2021. Subsequently, in October 2022, they bought bonds worth ₹40 crores.
